tag_list: creative, flash, multimedia, web-design, graphic-design, photoshop, designer, web-2-0, animations, presentations, brand-image, brand-identity, logo, brochure, leaflet, collateral, profile, design, stationary, poster, banner, advertisment, promotion, conce
overview:
Saad bin Naeem has expertise in concept development and visual implementation for creative tasks like brand image building, stationary design, web design, multimedia design and rich media design.

He joined business technologies in 2008 He has added a new dimension to the services provided at Business Technologies by setting up a creative department. Apart from that he is also involved in business development for the company.

He has 9 years of experience working for top brands, advertising agencies and IT companies. He has done his Masters in Multimedia Arts from the National College of Arts (Lahore) and also holds a Bachelors Degree in Computer Sciences from the Institute of Management Sciences (Pak-AIMS, Lahore).
